## Flashside

Moves the [Flashback](https://modrinth.com/mod/4das1Fjq) recording buttons to the side of the game menu.

Not in any way affiliated with Flashback.

[![Environment](https://img.shields.io/badge/Environment-Client-blue?logo=data:image/png;base64,)]()
[![Latest Minecraft](https://img.shields.io/modrinth/game-versions/JsjifJaW?label=Latest%20Minecraft&color=%2300AF5C&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://modrinth.com/mod/JsjifJaW/versions)

[![Loader](https://img.shields.io/badge/Available%20for-Fabric-dbd0b4?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://fabricmc.net/)

[![Download on Modrinth](https://img.shields.io/modrinth/dt/JsjifJaW?label=Download%20on%20Modrinth&logo=modrinth&logoColor=%2300AF5C)](https://modrinth.com/mod/JsjifJaW)
[![Download on GitHub](https://img.shields.io/github/downloads/TerminalMC/Flashside/total?label=Download%20on%20GitHub&logo=github&logoColor=white)](https://github.com/TerminalMC/Flashside)

</center></div>

### Why?

Because I kept accidentally hitting "Start Recording" when trying to leave servers.

### About

- You can use the Cloth Config options UI to customize how Flashside detects the game menu buttons. This may be useful
if you have other mods that make changes on the pause screen.
- Open to improvements on the overlay textures.

<table style="width:100%;">
  <tr>
    <td style="width:50%;"><img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/TerminalMC/Flashside/HEAD/assets/images/pause_01.png" style="width:100%;"></td>
    <td style="width:50%;"><img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/TerminalMC/Flashside/HEAD/assets/images/pause_02.png" style="width:100%;"></td>
  </tr>
</table>

### Dependencies

Fabric: [Flashback](https://modrinth.com/mod/4das1Fjq), [Fabric API](https://modrinth.com/mod/P7dR8mSH), [ModMenu](https://modrinth.com/mod/mOgUt4GM), [Cloth Config API](https://modrinth.com/mod/9s6osm5g)
